mapper.sql: ID, COMP_ID, STREET_TERRITORY_ID, PROVINCE_ID, PROVINCE_NAME, CODE, SEQ_NO, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DEL, DEL_USER_ID, DEL_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FUN_STREET_PROVINCE
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update FUN_STREET_PROVINCE
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{record.streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_ID = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_NAME = #{record.provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update FUN_STREET_PROVINCE set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{record.streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_ID = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_NAME = #{record.provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ_NO = #{record.seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEL_USER_ID = #{record.delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_TIME = #{record.delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update FUN_STREET_PROVINCE
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_NAME = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEQ_NO = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_STREET_PROVINCE set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_NAME = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ_NO = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.COMP_ID, A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID, A.PROVINCE_ID, A.PROVINCE_NAME, A.CODE, A.SEQ_NO, A.REMARK, A.CREATE_TIME, B.TERRITORY_NAME FROM FUN_STREET_PROVINCE A LEFT JOIN FUN_TERRITORY B ON A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID = B.ID WHERE A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{streetTerritoryId} AND A.IS_DEL = 0 ORDER BY A.SEQ_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE FUN_STREET_PROVINCE SET IS_DEL = 1, DEL_TIME = GETDATE(), DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.COMP_ID, A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID, A.PROVINCE_ID, A.PROVINCE_NAME, A.CODE, A.SEQ_NO, A.REMARK, A.CREATE_TIME, B.TERRITORY_NAME FROM FUN_STREET_PROVINCE A LEFT JOIN FUN_TERRITORY B ON A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID = B.ID WHERE A.ID = #{streetProvinceId}
